author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Central and State Government and Public Sector SC and ST Employees Federation has urged the State Ggovernment to take effective steps for filling up all the backlog vacancies reserved for Dalits, Backward Classes and Minorities in all the government departments with immediate effect.

A large number of posts are lying vacant for many years and this affected the running of the official machinery, a resolution adopted at the district office-bearers meeting of the Federation held here recently said.

Another resolution said that the indifferent attitude of the managements of the private colleges and universities was mainly responsible for students committing suicide. The State Government and the district administrations should take steps to identify the unrecognised colleges and initiate serious action against them in the interest of the student community.
title: Call to fill vacancies
